# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-105">合规性中心 (DLP) 数据丢失防护包括许多可供 DLP 策略使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-106">本文列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并演示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的信息。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-106">This article lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-107">若要了解有关敏感信息类型的信息，请参阅 [敏感信息类型](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-107">To learn more about sensitive information types, see [Sensitive information types](sensitive-information-type-learn-about.md)</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-108">ABA 路由号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-108">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-110">9 个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-110">nine digits that may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-111">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-111">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-112">00-12、21-32、61-72 或 80 之间的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-112">two digits in the ranges 00-12, 21-32, 61-72, or 80</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-113">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-113">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-114">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-114">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-115">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-115">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-116">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-116">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-117">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-117">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-118">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-118">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-119">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-119">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-120">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-120">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-121">如果策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，则策略具有中等可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-121">A policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-122">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-122">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-123">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-123">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-124">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-124">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-125">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-125">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-143">阿根廷国家/ (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-143">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-144">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-144">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-145">带或不带句号的八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-145">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-146">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-146">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-147">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-147">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-148">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-148">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-149">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-149">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-150">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-150">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-151">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-151">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-152">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-152">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-153">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-153">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-154">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-154">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-155">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-155">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-156">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-156">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-157">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-157">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-158">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-158">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_argentina_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-160">Keyword_argentina_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-163">cédula</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-163">cédula</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-164">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-164">dni</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-165">documento nacional de identidad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-165">documento nacional de identidad</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-166">documento número</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-166">documento número</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-167">documento numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-167">documento numero</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-169">rnp</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-169">rnp</span></span> 
   
## <a name="argentina-unique-tax-identification-key-cuitcuil"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-170">阿根廷唯一税务识别密钥 (CUIT/CUIL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-170">Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-171">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-171">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-172">带破折号的十一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-172">Eleven digits with dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-173">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-173">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-174">带破折号的十一个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-174">Eleven digits with a dash:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-175">20、23、24、27、30、33 或 34 中的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-175">two digits in 20, 23, 24, 27, 30, 33 or 34</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-176">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-176">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-177">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-177">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-178">连字符 (-) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-178">a hyphen (-)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-179">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-179">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-181">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-183">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-183">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-184">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-184">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-185">找到 的 `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-185">A keyword from `Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-186">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-186">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-187">函数 `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-187">The function `Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Argentina Unique Tax Identification Key (CUIT/CUIL) -->
      <Entity id="98da3da1-9199-4571-b7c4-b6522980b507" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Argentina_Unique_Tax_Key" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-201">唯一工作标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-201">Unique Work Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-202">工作标识的唯一密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-202">Unique Key of Work Identification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-204">税务识别的唯一密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-204">Unique Key of Tax Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-205">唯一人工标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-205">Unique Labor Identification Code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-206">唯一的人工标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-206">Unique Code of Labor Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-207">唯一人工标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-207">Unique Labor Identification Key</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-208">唯一的人工标识密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-208">Unique Key of Labor Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-209">tax ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-209">tax ID</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-226">澳大利亚银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-226">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-228">具有或不带银行省/市/县分支机构号码的六到十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-228">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-229">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-230">帐户号码是 6 到 10 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-230">Account number is 6 to 10 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-231">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-231">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-232">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-232">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-233">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-233">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-234">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-234">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-235">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-236">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-236">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-237">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-238">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-238">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-239">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-239">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-240">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-240">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-241">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-241">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-242">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-242">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-243">正则表达式Regex_australia_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-243">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-244">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-244">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-260">澳大利亚商务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-260">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-261">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-261">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-262">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-262">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-263">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-263">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-264">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-264">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-265">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-265">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-266">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-266">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-268">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-268">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-270">带可选分隔符的 11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-270">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-271">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-271">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-272">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-272">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-273">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-273">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-274">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-274">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-275">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-275">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-276">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-276">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-277">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-277">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-278">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-278">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-279">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-279">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-280">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-280">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-281">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-281">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-282">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-282">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-283">找到来自Keywords_australian_business_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-283">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-284">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-284">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-285">函数Func_australian_business_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-285">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-295">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-295">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-296">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-296">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-297">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-297">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-298">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-298">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-299">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-299">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-300">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-300">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-301">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-301">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-302">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-302">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-303">九个数字（带分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-303">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-304">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-304">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-305">带分隔符的九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-305">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-306">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-306">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-307">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-307">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-308">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-308">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-309">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-309">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-310">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-310">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-311">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-311">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-312">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-312">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-313">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-313">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-314">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-314">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-315">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-315">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-316">找到来自Keyword_Australian_Company_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-316">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-317">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-317">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-318">函数Func_Australian_Company_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-318">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-319">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-319">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_australia_company_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-320">Keyword_australia_company_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-321">can</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-321">acn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-322">australia company no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-322">australia company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-323">australia company no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-323">australia company no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-327">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-327">australian company number</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-328">澳大利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-328">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-330">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-330">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-332">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-332">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-333">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-333">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-334">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-334">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-335">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-335">five digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-336">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-336">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-337">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-337">one to two optional letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-338">四到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-338">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-339">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-339">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-340">九个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-340">nine digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-341">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-341">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-342">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-342">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-343">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-343">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-344">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-344">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-345">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-345">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-346">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-346">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-347">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-347">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-447">澳大利亚医疗帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-447">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-448">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-448">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-449">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-449">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-450">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-450">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-451">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-451">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-452">第一个数字范围为 2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-452">First digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-453">九个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-453">Nine digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-454">第十个数字是问题数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-454">Tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-455">第十一个数字（可选）是个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-455">Eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-456">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-457">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-458">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-459">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-460">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-460">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-461">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-461">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-462">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-462">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-474">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-474">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-476">八个或九个字母数字字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-476">eight or nine alphanumeric characters</span></span> 

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-477">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-478">一个字母 (N、E、D、F、A、C、U、X) 后跟 7 个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-478">one letter (N, E, D, F, A, C, U, X) followed by 7 digits or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-479">2 个字母 (PA、PB、PC、PD、PE、PF、PU、PW、PX、PZ) 后跟 7 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-479">2 letters (PA, PB, PC, PD, PE, PF, PU, PW, PX, PZ) followed by 7 digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-480">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-480">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-481">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-481">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-482">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-482">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-483">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-483">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-484">正则表达式查找 `Regex_australia_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-484">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-485">找到 的 `Keyword_australia_passport_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-485">A keyword from `Keyword_australia_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-486">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-486">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-487">正则表达式查找 `Regex_australia_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-487">The regular expression `Regex_australia_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Australia Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>  
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-507">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-507">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-509">八到九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-509">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-510">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-511">通常用空格显示八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-511">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-512">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-512">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-513">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-513">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-514">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-514">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-515">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-515">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-516">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-516">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-517">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-518">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-519">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-520">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-521">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-521">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-522">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-522">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-523">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-535">奥地利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-535">Austria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-536">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-536">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-537">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-537">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-538">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-538">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-539">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-539">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-540">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-541">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-541">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-542">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-543">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-543">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-544">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-544">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-545">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-545">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-672">奥地利身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-672">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-673">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-673">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-674">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-674">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-675">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-675">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-676">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-676">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-677">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-677">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-678">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-678">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-679">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-679">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-680">字母、数字和特殊字符的 24 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-680">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-681">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-681">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-682">24 个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-682">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-683">22 个字母 (不区分大小写) 数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-683">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-684">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-684">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-685">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-685">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-686">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-686">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-687">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-687">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-688">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-688">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-689">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-689">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-690">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-690">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-691">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-691">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-692">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-693">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-693">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-694">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-694">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-695">personalaus一sich österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-695">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-696">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-696">Austria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-697">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-697">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-698">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-698">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-699">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-699">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-700">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-700">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-701">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-701">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-702">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-702">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-703">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-703">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-704">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-704">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-705">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-705">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-706">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-706">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-707">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-707">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-708">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-708">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-709">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-709">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-710">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-710">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-711">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-711">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-712">正则表达式查找  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-712">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-713">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-713">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1c96ae4e-303b-447d-86c7-77113ac266bf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-737">奥地利社会保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-737">Austria social security number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-738">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-738">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-739">10 个数字，采用指定格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-739">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-740">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-740">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-741">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-741">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-742">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-742">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-743">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-743">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-744">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-744">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-745">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-746">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-746">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-747">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-748">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-748">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-749">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-749">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-750">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-750">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-751">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-751">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-752">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-752">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Social Security Number -->
      <Entity id="6896a906-86c9-4d19-a2da-6e43ccd19b7b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-768">social security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-768">social security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-769">sozialversicherungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-769">sozialversicherungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-770">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-770">sozialversicherungsnummer#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-771">soziale sicherheit kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-771">soziale sicherheit kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-772">sozialesicherheitkein#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-772">sozialesicherheitkein#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-773">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-773">ssn#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-778">奥地利税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-778">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-780">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-780">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-781">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-782">九个数字，带可选连字符和正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-782">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-783">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-783">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-784">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-784">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-785">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-785">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-786">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-786">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-787">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-787">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-788">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-788">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-789">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-789">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-790">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-790">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-791">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-791">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-792">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-792">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-793">找到 的  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-793">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-794">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-795">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-795">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-796">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-796">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-797">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-797">Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-798">österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-798">österreich</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-799">st.nr。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-799">st.nr.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-800">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-800">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-801">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-801">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-802">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-802">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-803">tax identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-803">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-804">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-804">tax no#</span></span>

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-818">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-818">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-819">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-819">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-820">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-820">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-821">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-821">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-822">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-822">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-823">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-823">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-824">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-824">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-826">11 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-826">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-828">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-828">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-829">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-829">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-830">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-830">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-831">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-831">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-832">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-832">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-833">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-833">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-834">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-834">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-835">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-835">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-836">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-836">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-837">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-837">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-838">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-838">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-839">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-839">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-840">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-840">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-841">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-841">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-842">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-842">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-843">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-843">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-844">找到来自Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-844">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-845">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-845">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-846">函数Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-846">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-852">vat no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-852">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-853">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-853">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-854">增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-854">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-855">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-855">austrian vat</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-861">vat 标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-861">vat identification number</span></span>

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-864">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-864">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-865">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-865">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-866">字符串"DocumentDb"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-866">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-867">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-867">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-868">字符串"DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-868">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-869">3-200 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-869">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-870">大于符号 (>) 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-870">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-871">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-871">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-872">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-872">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-873">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-873">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-874">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-874">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-875">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-875">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-876">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-876">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-877">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-877">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-878">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-878">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-879">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-879">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-880">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-880">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-881"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-881">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-882">contoso</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-882">contoso</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-883">fabrikam</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-883">fabrikam</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-884">northwind</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-884">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-885">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-885">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-886">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-886">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-887">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-887">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-888">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-888">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-889">testacs。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-889">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-890">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-890">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-891">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-891">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-892">net</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-892">net</span></span>

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-893">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-893">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-894">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-894">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-895">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-895">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-896">com"或"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-896">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-897">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-897">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-898">net"，字符串"Password"或"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-898">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-899">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-899">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-900">字符串"Server"、"server"或"data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-900">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-901">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-901">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-902">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-903">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-903">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-904">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-904">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-905">字符串"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-905">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-906">com"、"cloudapp.azure"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-906">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-907">net"或"database.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-907">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-908">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-908">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-909">1-300 位小写或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-909">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-910">字符串"Password"、"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-910">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-911">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-911">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-912">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-912">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-913">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-913">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-914">一个或多个不是分号字符 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇 (字符) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-914">one or more characters that aren't a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-915">分号 (;) 、引号 (") 或撇号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-915">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-916">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-917">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-917">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-918">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-919">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-919">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-920">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-920">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-921">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-921">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
