## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-936">Azure IoT连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-936">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-937">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-937">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-938">字符串"HostName"后跟模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-938">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-939">net"和"SharedAccessKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-939">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-940">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-941">字符串"HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-941">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-942">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-942">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-943">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-943">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-944">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-944">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-945">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-945">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-946">字符串"azure-devices"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-946">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-947">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-947">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-948">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-948">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-949">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-949">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-950">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-950">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-951">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-951">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-952">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-952">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-953">43 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-953">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-954">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-954">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-955">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-955">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-956">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-956">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-957">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-957">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-958">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-958">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-959">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-959">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-960">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-960">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

```xml
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1002">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1002">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1003">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1004">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1004">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1005">net"，后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"password"或"pwd"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1005">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1006">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1006">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1007">字符串"redis.cache.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1007">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1008">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1008">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1009">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1009">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1010">字符串"password"或"pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1010">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1011">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1011">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1012">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1012">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1013">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1013">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1014">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1014">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1015">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1015">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1016">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1017">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1017">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1018">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1019">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1019">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1020">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1020">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1021">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1021">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1024"> (，从技术上说，此敏感信息类型使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）标识这些) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1024">(Technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1029">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1029">onebox</span></span>

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1036">Azure SAS</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1036">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1037">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1037">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1038">字符串"sig"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1038">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1039">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1039">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1040">字符串"sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1040">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1041">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1041">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1042">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1042">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1043">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1043">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1044">小写或大写字母、数字或百分号之间的 43-53 个字符的任意组合 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1044">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1045">字符串"%3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1045">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1046">任何不是小写或大写字母、数字或百分号的字符 (%) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1046">any character that isn't a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1047">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1048">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1048">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1049">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1050">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1050">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1051">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureSAS查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1051">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure SAS-->
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-service-bus-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1052">Azure 服务总线连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1052">Azure service bus connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1054">字符串"EndPoint"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1054">The string "EndPoint" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1055">net"和"SharedAccesKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1055">net" and "SharedAccesKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1056">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1057">字符串"EndPoint"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1057">the string "EndPoint"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1058">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1058">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1059">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1059">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1060">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1060">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1061">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1061">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1062">字符串"servicebus.windows"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1062">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1063">net"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1063">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1064">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1064">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1065">字符串"SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1065">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1066">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1066">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1067">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1067">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1068">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1068">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1069">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1069">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1070">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1070">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1071">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1071">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1072">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1072">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1073">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1073">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1074">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1074">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1075">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1075">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1076">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1076">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1091">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1091">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1092">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1092">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1093">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串，包括字符串"AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1093">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1094">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1094">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1095">字符串"DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1095">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1096">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1096">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1097">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1097">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1098">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1098">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1099">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1099">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1100">字符串"AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1100">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1101">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1101">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1102">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1102">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1103">零到两个空格字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1103">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1104">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1104">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1105">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1105">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1106">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1107">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1107">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1108">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1109">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1109">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1110">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1110">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1111">正则表达式CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1111">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1112">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1112">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1130">Azure 存储常规 (帐户密钥) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1130">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1131">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1131">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1132">86 个小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合，前面或后跟以下模式中列出的字符。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1132">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1133">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1133">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1134">零到大于符号 (>) 、撇号 (') 、等号 (=) 、引号 (") 或数字符号 (#) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1134">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1135">小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1135">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1136">两个等 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1136">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1137">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1138">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1139">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1140">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1140">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1141">正则表达式CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1141">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1142">比利时驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1142">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1144">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1144">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1145">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1146">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1146">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1147">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1147">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1148">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1148">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1149">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1149">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1150">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1150">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1151">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1151">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1152">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1152">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Belgium Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d89fd329-9324-433c-b687-2c37bd5166f3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1285">比利时国家号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1285">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1286">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1286">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1287">11 个数字加上可选的分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1287">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1288">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1288">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1289">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1289">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1290">YY 格式的六个数字和两个可选句点。出生日期的 MM.DD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1290">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1291">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1291">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1292">三个连续的数字 (男性为奇数，即使对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1292">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1293">点、短划线、空格中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1293">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1294">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1294">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1295">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1295">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1296">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1296">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1297">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1297">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1298">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1298">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1299">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1299">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1300">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1300">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1301">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1301">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1302">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1302">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1303">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1303">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1304">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1304">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1363">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1363">Belgium passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1364">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1364">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1365">两个字母后跟 6 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1365">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1366">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1366">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1367">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1367">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1368">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1368">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1369">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1369">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1370">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1370">Definition</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1371">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1371">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1372">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1372">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1373">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1373">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1374">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1374">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1375">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1375">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1376">正则表达式查找  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1376">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1377">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1377">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d7b1315b-21ca-4774-a32a-596010ff78fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1404">比利时增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1404">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1405">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1405">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1406">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1406">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1407">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1407">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1408">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1408">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1409">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1409">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1410">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1410">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1412">12 字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1412">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1413">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1414">12 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1414">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1415">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1415">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1416">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1416">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1417">数字 0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1417">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1418">从 1 到 9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1418">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1419">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1419">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1420">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1420">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1421">可选点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1421">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1422">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1422">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1423">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1423">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1424">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1424">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1425">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1425">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1426">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1426">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1427">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1427">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1428">找到来自Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1428">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1429">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1429">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1430">函数Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1430">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1431">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1431">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1432">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1432">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1433">n？ tva</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1433">nº tva</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1435">vat no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1435">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1436">numéro t.v.a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1436">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1437">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1437">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1438">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1438">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1439">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1439">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1440">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1440">btw#</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1442">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1442">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1443">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1443">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1444">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1444">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1445">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1445">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1446">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1446">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1447">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1447">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1448">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1448">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1449">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1449">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1450">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1450">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1451">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1451">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1452">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1452">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1453">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1453">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1454">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1454">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1455">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1455">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1456">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1456">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1457">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1457">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1458">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1458">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1459">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1459">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1460">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1460">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1461">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1461">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1462">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1462">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1463">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1463">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1464">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1464">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1465">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1466">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1466">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1467">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1468">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1468">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1471">收入</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1471">Revenue</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1477">CNPJ (巴西法律实体) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1477">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1479">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1479">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1480">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1480">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1481">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1481">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1482">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1482">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1483">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1483">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1484">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1484">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1485">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1485">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1486">三个数字 (前八个数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1486">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1487">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1487">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1488">四位数分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1488">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1489">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1489">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1490">两个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1490">two digits that are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1491">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1491">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1492">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1492">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1493">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1493">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1494">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1494">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1495">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1495">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1496">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1496">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1497">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1497">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1498">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1498">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1499">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1499">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1500">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1522">巴西国家身份证 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1522">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1523">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1524">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1524">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1525">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1526">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1526">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1527">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1527">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1528">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1528">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1529">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1529">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1530">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1530">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1531">a period</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1531">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1532">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1532">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1533">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1533">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1534">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1534">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1535">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1536">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1536">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1537">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1537">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1538">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1538">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1539">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1540">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1540">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1541">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1542">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1542">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1543">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1543">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1544">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1544">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1545">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1545">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
      <Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1548">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1548">Cédula de identidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1550">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1550">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1551">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1551">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1552">registro de Iidentidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1554">RG (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1554">RG (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1555">RIC (关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1555">RIC (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1556">保加利亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1556">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1558">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1558">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1559">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1560">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1560">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1561">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1562">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1562">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1563">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1564">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1564">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1565">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1565">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1566">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1566">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="66d39258-94c2-43b2-804b-aa312258e54b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>    
```

## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1693">保加利亚统一编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1693">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1694">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1694">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1695">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1695">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1696">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1696">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1697">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1697">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1698">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1698">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1699">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1699">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1700">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1700">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1701">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1701">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1702">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1702">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1703">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1703">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1704">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1704">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1705">两个数字，对应于出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1705">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1706">对应于性别的一个数字：男性的偶数位数和男性的奇数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1706">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1707">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1707">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1708">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1709">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1709">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1710">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1711">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1711">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1712">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1712">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1713">找到 的  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1713">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1714">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1714">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1715">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1715">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1760">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1760">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1761">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1761">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1762">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1762">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1763">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1763">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1764">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1764">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1765">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1765">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1766">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1766">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1767">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1767">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1768">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1768">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1769">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1769">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1770">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1770">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1771">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1771">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1772">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1772">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1773">正则表达式查找  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1773">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1774">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1774">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="f7172b82-c588-4216-845e-4e54e397f29a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1794">加拿大银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1794">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1795">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1796">7 个或 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1796">7 or 12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1797">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1798">加拿大银行帐号是 7 个或 12 个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1798">A Canada Bank Account Number is 7 or 12 digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1799">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1799">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1800">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1800">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1801">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1801">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1802">三个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1802">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1803">零"0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1803">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1804">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1804">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1805">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1805">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1806">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1806">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1807">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1807">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1808">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1808">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1809">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1809">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1810">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1810">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1811">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1811">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1812">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1812">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1813">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1813">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1814">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1814">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number" />
   </Pattern>
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1838">加拿大驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1838">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1839">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1839">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1840">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1840">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1841">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1841">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1842">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1842">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1843">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1844">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1844">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1845">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1846">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1847">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1847">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1848">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1848">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1849">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1849">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_alberta_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_alberta_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_british_columbia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_british_columbia_drivers_license_name" />

      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_manitoba_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_manitoba_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_brunswick_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_brunswick_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_newfoundland_labrador_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_nova_scotia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_nova_scotia_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ontario_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ontario_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_prince_edward_island_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_quebec_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_quebec_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_saskatchewan_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_saskatchewan_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1985">加拿大卫生服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1985">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1986">Format</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1987">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1987">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1988">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1989">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1989">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1990">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1991">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1992">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1993">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1993">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1994">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1994">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-1995">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-1995">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
