## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2007">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2007">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2008">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2008">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2009">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2009">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2010">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2010">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2011">两个小写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2011">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2012">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2012">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2013">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2013">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2014">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2014">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2015">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2015">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2016">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2016">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2017">找到来自Keyword_canada_passport_number或Keyword_passport关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2017">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2047">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2047">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2048">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2048">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2049">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2049">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2050">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2050">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2051">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2051">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2052">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2052">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2053">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2053">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2054">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2054">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2055">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2055">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2056">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2056">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2057">至少找到了两个来自Keyword_canada_phin或Keyword_canada_provinces关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2057">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2090">加拿大社会保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2090">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2091">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2092">九个数字（可选连字符或空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2092">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2093">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2094">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2094">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2095">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2095">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2096">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2096">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2097">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2097">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2098">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2098">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2099">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2099">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2100">无格式：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2100">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2101">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2101">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2102">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2102">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2103">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2103">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2104">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2104">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2105">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2105">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2106">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2106">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2107">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2107">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2108">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2108">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2109">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2109">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2110">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2110">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2111">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2111">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2112">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2112">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2113">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2113">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2114">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2114">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2139">智利身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2139">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2141">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个检查数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2141">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2142">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2143">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2143">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2144">一到两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2144">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2145">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2145">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2146">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2146">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2147">可选时间段</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2147">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2148">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2148">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2149">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2149">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2150">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 一个数字或字母，这是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2150">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2151">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2151">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2152">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2152">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2153">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2153">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2154">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2154">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2155">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2155">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2156">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2156">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2157">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2157">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2158">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2158">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2159">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2159">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2160">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2194">智利标识否。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2194">Chile identity no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2195">智利标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2195">Chile identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2196">智利标识#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2196">Chile identity #</span></span>

   
## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2197">中国居民身份证 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2197">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2198">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2198">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2199">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2199">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2200">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2200">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2201">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2201">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2202">六个数字，表示地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2202">six digits that are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2203">八个数字，格式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2203">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2204">三个数字，表示订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2204">three digits that are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2205">一个数字，是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2205">one digit that is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2206">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2207">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2207">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2208">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2209">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2209">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2210">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2210">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2211">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2211">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2212">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2212">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2213">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2213">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2214">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2214">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2215">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2215">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2216">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2216">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2217">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2217">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2218">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2218">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2219">中国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2219">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2220">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2220">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2221">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2221">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2222">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2222">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2223">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2223">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2224">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2224">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2225">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2225">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2226">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2226">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2227">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2227">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2228">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2228">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2229">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2229">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2230">14 到 16 个数字，可以格式化或无格式 (dddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2230">14 to 16 digits that can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and that must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2231">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2231">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2232">复杂而强大的模式，用于检测全球所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、MasterCard、Discover Card、JCB、American Express、名片和第三者卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2232">Complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2233">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2233">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2234">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2234">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2235">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2235">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2236">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2236">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2237">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2237">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2238">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2238">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2239">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2239">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2240">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2240">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2241">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2241">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2242">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2242">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2243">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2243">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2244">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2244">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2245">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2245">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2505">克罗地亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2505">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2507">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2507">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2509">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2509">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2510">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2511">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2512">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2513">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2513">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2514">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2514">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2515">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2515">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2639">克罗地亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2639">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2640">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2640">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2641">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2641">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2642">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2642">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2643">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2643">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2644">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2644">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2645">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2645">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2646">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2647">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2647">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2648">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2649">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2649">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2650">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2650">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2651">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2651">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2682">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2682">Croatia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2684">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2684">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2685">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2686">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2686">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2687">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2688">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2688">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2689">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2690">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2690">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2691">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2691">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2692">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2692">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2693">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2693">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2694">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2694">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2695">正则表达式查找  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2695">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2696">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2696">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Croatia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7d7a729d-32d8-4204-8d01-d5e6a6c25581" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2697">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2697">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2698">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2698">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2714">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2714">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2715">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2715">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2716">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2716">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2717">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2718">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2718">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2719">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2719">10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2720">最终数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2720">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2721">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2721">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2722">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2722">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2723">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2723">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2724">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2724">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2725">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2725">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2726">找到来自Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2726">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2727">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2727">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2728">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2728">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2729">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2729">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2730">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2730">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2761">塞浦路斯驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2761">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2763">不带空格和分隔符的 12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2763">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2764">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2765">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2765">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2766">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2766">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2767">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2767">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2768">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2768">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2769">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2769">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2770">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2770">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2771">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2771">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2896">塞浦路斯身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2896">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2897">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2897">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2898">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2898">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2899">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2899">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2900">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2900">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2901">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2901">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2902">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2902">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2903">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2904">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2904">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2905">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2906">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2906">10 digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2907">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2908">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2908">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2909">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2910">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2910">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2911">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2911">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2912">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2912">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2913">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2913">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2914">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2914">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2915">id card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2915">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2916">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2916">identity card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2917">kim且 karti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2917">kimlik karti</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2918">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2918">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2919">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2919">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2920">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2920">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2921">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2921">Cyprus passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2923">一个字母后跟 6-8 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2923">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2924">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2925">一个字母后跟六到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2925">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2926">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2926">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2927">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2927">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2928">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2928">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2929">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2929">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2930">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2930">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2931">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2931">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2932">正则表达式查找 `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` DD/MM/YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2932">The regular expression `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD/MM/YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2933">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2933">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2934">正则表达式查找  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2934">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2935">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2935">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>  
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="9193e2e8-7f8c-43c1-a274-ac40d651936f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2936">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2936">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number_common"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2937">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2937">Keywords_eu_passport_number_common</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2938">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2938">passport#</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2964">塞浦路斯税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2964">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2965">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2966">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2967">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2968">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2969">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2970">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2972">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2972">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2974">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2974">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2975">"0"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2975">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2976">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2976">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2977">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2977">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2978">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2979">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2979">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2980">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2981">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2981">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2982">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2982">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2983">找到 的  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2983">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2984">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2984">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-2985">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-2985">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3013">捷克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3013">Czech driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3014">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3014">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3015">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3015">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3016">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3016">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3017">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3017">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3018">字母"E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3018">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3019">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3019">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3020">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3020">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3021">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3021">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3022">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3022">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3023">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3023">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3024">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3024">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3025">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3025">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3026">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3026">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3027">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3027">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3153">捷克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3153">Czech passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3154">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3155">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3156">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3157">八个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3158">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3159">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3160">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3161">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3161">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3162">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3163">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3164">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3164">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3165">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3165">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3166">正则表达式查找  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3166">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3167">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3167">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Czech Republic Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7bcd8ce8-5e92-4bbe-bc92-fa669f0369fa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3189">捷克个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3189">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3190">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3190">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3191">九个数字，带可选正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，带可选正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3191">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) 10 digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3192">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3192">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3193">九个数字 (旧格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3193">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3194">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3194">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3195">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3195">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3196">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3196">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3197">10 个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3197">10 digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3198">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3198">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3199">可选正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3199">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3200">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3200">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3201">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3201">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3202">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3202">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3203">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3203">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3204">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3204">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3205">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3205">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3206">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3206">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3207">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3207">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3208">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3208">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3209">函数Func_czech_id_card_new_format查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3209">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3210">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3257">丹麦驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3257">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3258">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3258">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3259">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3259">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3260">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3260">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3261">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3261">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3262">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3263">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3263">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3264">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3265">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3265">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3266">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3266">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3267">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3267">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3391">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3391">Denmark passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3392">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3392">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3393">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3393">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3394">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3394">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3395">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3395">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3397">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3397">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3399">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3400">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3400">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3401">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3401">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3402">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date2` 格式为 DD MM YY 的日期或 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 找到的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3402">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date2` finds date in the format DD MM YY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3403">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3403">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3404">正则表达式查找  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3404">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3405">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3405">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="25e8c47e-e6fe-4884-a211-74898f8c0196" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date2" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3425">丹麦个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3425">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3426">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3427">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3427">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3428">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3429">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3429">10 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3430">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3430">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3431">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3431">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3432">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3432">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3433">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3433">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3434">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3434">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3435">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3435">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3436">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3436">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3437">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3437">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3438">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3438">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3439">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3439">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3440">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3440">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3441">正则表达式Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3441">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3442">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3442">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
