## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3514">管制局 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3514">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3516">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3516">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3517">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3518">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3518">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3519">一个字母 (可能) 不区分大小写：abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是一个注册表代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3519">one letter (not case-sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3520">一个字母 (不区分大小写) ，即注册人姓氏或数字"9"的第一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3520">one letter (not case-sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3521">七个数字，最后一个数字是检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3521">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3522">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3523">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3523">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3524">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3525">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3525">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3526">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3526">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3527">找到的 `Keyword_dea_number` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3527">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3528">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3528">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3529">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3529">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3530">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3530">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3531">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3531">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3532">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3532">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3533">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3534">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3534">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3535">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3535">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3536">一些强制执行管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3536">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3537">犯罪管制机构</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3537">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3538">爱沙尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3538">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3540">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3540">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3541">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3542">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3542">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3543">字母"ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3543">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3544">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3544">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3545">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3545">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3546">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3546">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3547">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3547">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3548">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3548">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3549">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3549">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3550">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3550">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3676">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3676">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3677">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3678">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3679">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3680">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3681">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3682">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3684">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3684">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3685">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3686">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3687">一个数字，对应于性生活和年龄 (奇数男性，偶数男性;1-2：19 世纪;3-4：20 世纪;5-6：21 世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3687">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3688">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3688">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3689">三个数字，对应于同一日期出生日期的分隔人的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3689">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3690">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3690">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3691">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3692">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3693">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3694">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3695">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3695">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3696">找到 的  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3696">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3697">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3698">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3698">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3731">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3731">Estonia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3732">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3732">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3733">一个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3733">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3734">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3734">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3735">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3735">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3736">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3737">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3737">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3738">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3739">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3739">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3740">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3740">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3741">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3741">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3742">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3742">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3743">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3743">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3744">正则表达式查找  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3744">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3745">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3745">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61f7073a-509e-425b-a754-bc01bb5d5b8c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3763">欧盟借记卡号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3763">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3765">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3765">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3766">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3767">复杂而可靠的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3767">Complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3768">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3768">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3769">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3769">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3770">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3770">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3771">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3771">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3772">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3772">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3773">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3773">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3774">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3774">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3775">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3775">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3776">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3776">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3777">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3777">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3778">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3778">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-3779">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-3779">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4226">芬兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4226">Finland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4227">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4227">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4228">10 个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4228">10 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4229">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4229">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4230">10 个数字，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4230">10 digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4231">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4231">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4232">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4232">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4233">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4233">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4234">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4234">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4235">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4235">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4236">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4236">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4237">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4237">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4238">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4238">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4239">正则表达式查找  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4239">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4240">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4240">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4371">芬兰欧洲健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4371">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4372">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4372">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4373">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4373">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4374">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4374">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4375">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4375">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4376">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4376">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4377">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4377">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4379">20 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4379">20-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4380">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4381">20 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4381">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4382">10 个数字 - 8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4382">10 digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4383">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4383">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4384">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4384">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4385">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4385">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4386">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4386">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4387">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4387">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4388">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4388">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4389">正则表达式Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4389">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4390">找到来自Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4390">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4408">芬兰国家/区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4408">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4409">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4409">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4410">六个数字加一个字符，表示一世纪加三个数字加一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4410">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4411">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4411">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4412">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4412">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4413">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4413">six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4414">century marker (either '-'， '+' or 'a') </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4414">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4415">三位数的个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4415">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4416">一个数字或 (不区分大小写) 检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4416">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4417">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4418">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4418">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4419">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4420">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4420">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4421">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4421">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4422">找到来自Keyword_finnish_national_id的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4422">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4423">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4423">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4424">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4424">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4425">函数Func_finnish_national_id查找与模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4425">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4426">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4426">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4475">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4475">Finland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4476">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4476">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4477">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4477">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4478">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4478">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4479">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4479">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4480">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4480">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4481">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4481">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4482">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4482">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4483">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4483">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4484">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4484">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4485">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4485">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4486">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4486">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4487">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4487">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4488">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4488">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4489">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4489">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4490">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4490">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4491">正则表达式查找 `Regex_finland_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4491">The regular expression `Regex_finland_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4492">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_finland_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4492">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_finland_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_finland_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4505">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4505">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4506">suomalainen passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4506">suomalainen passi</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_date"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4513">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4513">Keywords_eu_passport_date</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4516">法国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4516">France driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4517">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中可用，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4517">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4518">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4518">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4519">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4519">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4520">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4520">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4521">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4521">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4522">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4522">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4523">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4523">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4524">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4524">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4525">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4525">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4526">函数Func_french_drivers_license查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4526">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4527">找到Keyword_french_drivers_license关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4527">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4528">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4528">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_french_drivers_license"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4529">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4529">Keyword_french_drivers_license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4530">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4530">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4531">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4531">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4532">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4532">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4533">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4533">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4534">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4534">driverlicence</span></span>

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4654">法国健康保险号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4654">France health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4655">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4655">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4656">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4656">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4657">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4657">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4658">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4658">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4659">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4659">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4660">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4660">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4662">21 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4662">21-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4664">21 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4664">21-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4665">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4665">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4666">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4666">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4667">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4667">10 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4668">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4668">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4669">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4669">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4670">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4670">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4671">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4671">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4672">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4672">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4673">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4673">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4674">正则表达式Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4674">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4675">找到来自Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4675">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4678">insurance card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4678">insurance card</span></span>

## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4681">法国国家/ (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4681">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4683">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4685">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4685">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4686">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4687">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4688">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4689">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4689">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4690">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4690">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4691">找到来自Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4691">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4692">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4692">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4693">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4693">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4694">card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4694">card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4696">carte nationale d'idenite no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4696">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4697">cni#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4697">cni#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4698">cni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4698">cni</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4699">compte bancaire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4699">compte bancaire</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4700">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4700">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4701">national identity</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4701">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4702">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4702">nationalidno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4704">numéro de carte vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4704">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4705">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4705">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4706">欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中提供了此敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4706">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4707">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4707">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4708">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4708">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4709">九个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4709">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4710">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4710">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4711">九个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4711">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4712">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4712">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4713">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4713">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4714">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4714">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4715">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4715">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4716">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4716">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4717">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4717">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4718">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4718">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4719">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4719">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4720">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4720">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4721">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4721">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4722">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4722">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4723">函数 `Func_fr_passport` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4723">The function `Func_fr_passport` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4724">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4724">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_france_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- France Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4726">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4726">Keywords_eu_passport_number</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4737">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4737">Keywords_france_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4742">passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4742">passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4743">passeportnon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4743">passeportnon</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4745">passeport français</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4745">passeport français</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4755">法国社会保险号码 (INSEE) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4755">France social security number (INSEE)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4757">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4757">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4759">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4759">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4760">13 个数字，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4760">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4761">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4761">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4762">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4762">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4764">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4764">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4766">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4766">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4767">函数 `Func_french_insee` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4767">The function `Func_french_insee` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4768">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4768">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4769">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4769">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4770">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4770">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4771">函数Func_french_insee或Func_fr_insee找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4771">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4772">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4772">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France INSEE -->
    <Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4773">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4773">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4774">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4775">code sécu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4775">code sécu</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4803">法国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4803">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4805">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4805">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4806">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4806">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4807">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4807">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4808">一个数字，必须为 0、1、2 或 3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4808">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4809">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4809">One digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4810">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4810">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4811">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4811">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4812">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4812">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4813">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4813">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4814">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4814">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4815">三个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4815">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4816">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4816">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4817">三个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4817">Three check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4818">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4818">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4819">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4819">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4820">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4820">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4821">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4821">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4822">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4822">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4823">找到 的  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4823">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4824">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4824">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4825">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4825">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4832">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4832">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4833">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4833">tax no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4837">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4837">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4838">一些#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4838">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4839">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4839">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4840">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4840">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4841">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4841">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4842">tin id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4842">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4843">tin no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4843">tin no</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4845">法国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4845">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4846">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4846">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4847">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4847">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4848">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4848">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4849">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4849">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4850">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4850">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4851">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4851">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4853">13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4853">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4854">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4855">13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4855">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4856">两个字母 - FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4856">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4857">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4857">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4858">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4858">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4859">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4859">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4860">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4860">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4861">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4861">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4862">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4862">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4863">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4863">an optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4864">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4864">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4865">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4865">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4866">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4866">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4867">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4867">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4868">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4868">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4869">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4869">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4870">找到来自Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4870">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4871">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4871">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4872">函数Func_france_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4872">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4874">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4874">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4885">德国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4885">Germany driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4886">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4886">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4887">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4887">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4888">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4888">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4889">11 个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4889">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4890">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4890">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4891">11 个数字和字母 (不区分) 大小写：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4891">11 digits and letters (not case-sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4892">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4892">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4893">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4893">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4894">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4894">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4895">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4895">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4896">数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4896">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4897">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4897">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4898">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4898">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4899">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4899">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4900">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4900">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4901">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4901">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4902">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4902">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-4903">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-4903">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```
