## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5052">德国身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5052">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5054">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5054">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5055">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5055">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5057">自 2010 年 11 月 1 日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5057">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5058">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5058">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5059">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5059">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5060">从 1987 年 4 月 1 日到 2010 年 10 月 31 日：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5060">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5061">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5061">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5062">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5062">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5063">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5063">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5064">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5064">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5065">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5065">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5066">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5066">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5067">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5067">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5068">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5068">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5069">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5070">aus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5070">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5071">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5071">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5072">identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5072">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5073">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5073">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5074">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5074">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5075">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5075">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5076">标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5076">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5077">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5077">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5078">个人 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5078">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5079">personalaus一s</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5079">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5080">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5080">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5081">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5081">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5082">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5082">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5083">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5083">Germany passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5084">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5084">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5085">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5085">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5086">10 个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5086">10 digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5087">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5087">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5088">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5088">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5089">第一个字符是此集合中的数字或字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5089">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5090">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5090">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5091">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5091">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5092">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5092">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5093">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5094">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5094">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5095">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5096">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5096">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5097">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5097">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5098">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5098">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5099">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5099">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5100">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5100">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5101">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5101">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5102">找到 或 `Keyword_german_passport` `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5102">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` or `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5103">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5103">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5126">德国税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5126">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5127">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5128">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5128">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5129">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5130">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5130">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5131">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5131">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5132">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5132">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5133">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5133">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5134">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5134">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5135">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5135">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5136">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5136">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5137">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5137">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5138">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5138">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5139">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5139">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5140">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5140">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5141">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5141">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5142">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5142">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5143">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5143">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5144">找到 的  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5144">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5145">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5145">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5146">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5146">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5172">德国增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5172">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5173">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5173">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5174">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5174">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5175">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5175">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5176">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5176">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5177">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5177">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5178">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5178">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5179">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5179">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5180">11 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5180">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5181">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5181">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5182">11 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5182">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5183">字母 D 或 d</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5183">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5184">字母 E 或 e</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5184">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5185">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5185">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5186">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5186">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5187">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5187">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5188">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5188">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5189">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5189">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5190">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5190">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5191">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5191">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5192">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5192">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5193">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5193">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5194">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5194">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5195">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5195">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5196">找到来自Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5196">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5197">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5197">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5198">函数Func_germany_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5198">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5199">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5199">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5200">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5200">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5201">vat number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5201">vat number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5203">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5203">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5204">vat# mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5204">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5205">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5205">mwst</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5207">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5207">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5208">希腊驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5208">Greece driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5209">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5209">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5210">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5210">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5211">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5211">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5212">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5212">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5213">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5213">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5215">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5215">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5217">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5217">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5218">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5218">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5219">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5219">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5345">希腊国民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5345">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5346">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5346">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5347">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5347">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5348">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5348">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5349">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5349">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5350">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5350">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5351">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5351">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5352">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5352">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5353">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5353">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5354">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5354">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5355">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5355">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5356">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5356">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5357">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5357">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5358">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5358">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5359">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5359">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5360">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5360">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5361">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5361">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5362">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5362">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5363">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5363">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5364">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5364">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5369">希腊语个人 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5369">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5370">希腊语政府 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5370">greek police id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5375">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5375">Greece passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5376">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5376">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5377">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5377">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5378">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5378">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5379">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5379">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5380">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5380">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5381">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5381">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5382">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5382">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5383">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5383">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5384">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5384">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5385">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5385">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5386">正则表达式查找 `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` DD MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 8 月 19) 找到关键字 `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5386">The regular expression `Regex_greece_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM YY (Example - 28 Aug 19) or a keyword from `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5387">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5387">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5388">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5388">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5389">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5389">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="7e65eb47-cdf9-4f52-8f90-2a27d5ee67e3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-social-security-number-amka"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5406">希腊社会保险号码 (AMKA) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5406">Greece Social Security Number (AMKA)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5407">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5407">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5408">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5408">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5409">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5409">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5410">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5410">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5411">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5411">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5412">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5412">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5414">无空格和分隔符的 11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5414">Eleven digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5415">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5415">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5416">6 个数字作为出生日期 YYMMDD</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5416">6 digits as date of birth YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5417">4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5417">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5418">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5418">a check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5419">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5419">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5420">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5420">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5421">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5421">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5422">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5422">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5423">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5423">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5424">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5424">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5425">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5425">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5426">函数  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5426">The function  `Func_greece_eu_ssn` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Greece Social Security Number (AMKA) -->
      <Entity id="e39b03f4-50ea-41ae-af7a-a4b9539596ad" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_greece_eu_ssn" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5437">希腊税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5437">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5438">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5438">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5439">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5439">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5440">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5440">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5441">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5441">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5442">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5442">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5443">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5443">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5444">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5444">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5445">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5445">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5446">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5446">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5447">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5447">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5448">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5448">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5449">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5449">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5450">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5450">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5451">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5451">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5452">正则表达式查找  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5452">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5453">找到 的  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5453">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5482">Hk Kong identity card (HKID) number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5482">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5483">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5483">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5484">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5484">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5485">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5485">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5486">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5486">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5487">1-2 个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5487">1-2 letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5488">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5488">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5489">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5489">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5490">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5491">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5491">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5492">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5493">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5493">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5494">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5494">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5495">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5495">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5496">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5496">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5497">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5497">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5498">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5498">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5499">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5539">匈牙利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5539">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5540">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5541">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5541">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5542">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5543">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5543">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5544">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5544">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5545">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5545">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5546">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5547">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5547">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5548">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5549">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5549">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5550">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5550">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5551">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5551">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5676">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5676">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5677">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5677">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5678">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5678">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5679">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5679">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5680">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5680">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5681">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5681">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5682">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5682">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5683">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5683">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5684">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5684">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5685">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5685">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5686">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5686">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5687">1 个数字对应于性别 (1-男性、2-男性，对于在 1900 之前年龄的男性或具有双重公民关系) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5687">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5688">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5688">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5689">对应于序列号的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5689">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5690">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5690">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5691">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5691">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5692">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5692">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5693">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5693">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5694">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5694">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5695">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5695">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5696">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5696">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5697">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5697">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5698">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5698">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5699">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5699">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5700">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5701">id number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5701">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5702">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5702">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5703">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5703">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5704">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5704">sz.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5705">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5705">ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5706">sz.ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5706">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5707">személyazonosító igazolv一y</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5707">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5708">személyi igazolvméy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5708">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5709">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5709">Hungary passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5710">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5710">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5711">两个字母后跟 6 个或 7 个数字，没有空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5711">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5712">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5712">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5713">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5713">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5714">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5714">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5715">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5715">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5716">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5716">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5717">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5717">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5718">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5718">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5719">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5719">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5720">正则表达式查找 `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例 - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) 找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5720">The regular expression `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YY (Example - 01 MÁR/MAR 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5721">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5721">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5722">正则表达式查找  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5722">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5723">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5723">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5b483910-9aa7-4c99-9917-f4001464bda7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-taj"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5743">匈牙利社会保险号码 (TAJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5743">Hungary social security number (TAJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5745">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5745">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5747">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5747">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5748">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5749">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5749">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5750">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5751">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5752">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5752">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5753">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5753">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5754">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5754">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5755">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5755">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Social Security Number (TAJ) -->
      <Entity id="0de78315-9537-47f5-95ab-b3e77eba3993" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5775">匈牙利税收标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5775">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5776">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5776">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5777">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5777">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5778">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5778">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5779">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5779">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5780">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5780">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5781">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5781">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5782">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5782">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5783">10 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5783">10 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5784">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5784">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5785">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5785">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5786">一个数字必须为"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5786">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5787">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5787">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5788">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5788">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5790">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5790">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5792">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5792">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5793">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5793">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5794">找到 的  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5794">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5795">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5795">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5796">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5796">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5822">匈牙利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5822">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5823">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5824">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5825">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5826">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5827">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5828">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5830">10 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5830">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5831">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5832">10 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5832">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5833">两个字母 - HU 或 hu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5833">two letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5834">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5834">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5835">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5835">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5836">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5836">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5837">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5837">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5838">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5838">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5839">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5839">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5840">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5840">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5841">找到来自Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5841">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5842">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5842">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5843">函数Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5843">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5844">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5844">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5845">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5845">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5846">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5846">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5847">增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5847">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5848">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5848">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5849">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5849">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5850">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5850">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5851">tax no.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5851">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5852">value added tax áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5852">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5853">kázósségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5853">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5854">által一os forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5854">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5855">hozzáadott一ték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5855">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5856">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5856">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5857">PAN (印度永久) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5857">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5858">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5858">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5859">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5859">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5860">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5860">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5861">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5861">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5862">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5862">Three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5863">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J、G (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5863">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5864">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5864">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5865">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5865">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5866">字母是字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5866">A letter that is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5867">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5867">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5868">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5868">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5869">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5869">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5870">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5870">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5871">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5871">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5872">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5872">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5873">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5873">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5874">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5874">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5875">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5875">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5876">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5877">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5877">Permanent Account Number</span></span>
