## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5879">印度唯一 (Aadhaar) 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5879">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5881">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5881">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5883">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5883">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5884">不为 0 或 1 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5884">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5885">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5885">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5886">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5886">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5887">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5887">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5888">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5888">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5889">最后一个数字，即检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5889">The final digit, which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5890">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5891">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5891">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5892">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5893">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5893">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5894">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5894">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5895">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5895">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5896">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5896">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5897">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5897">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5898">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5898">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5899">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5899">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5900">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5900">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5901">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5901">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5902">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5902">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5903">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5903">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5904">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5904">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5905">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5905">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5906">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5906">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5907">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5907">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5908">印度尼西亚身份证号码 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5908">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5909">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5909">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5910">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5910">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5911">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5911">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5912">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5912">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5913">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5913">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5914">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5914">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5915">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5915">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5916">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5916">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5917">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5917">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5918">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5918">Six digits in the format DDMMYY, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5919">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5919">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5920">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5920">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5921">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5922">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5923">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5924">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5924">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5925">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5925">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5926">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5926">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5932">国际银行帐号 (IBAN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5932">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5933">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5934">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5934">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5935">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5935">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5936">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5936">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5937">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5937">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5938">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5938">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5939">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5939">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5940">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5940">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-p137">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-p137">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5943">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5945">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5945">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5947">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5947">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5948">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5948">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5949">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5949">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5950">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5950">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5951">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5951">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5952">ICD-10-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5952">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5954">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5954">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5955">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5956">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5956">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5957">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5958">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5958">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5959">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5960">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5960">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5961">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5961">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5962">找到来自Dictionary_icd_10_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5962">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5963">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5963">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5964">找到更新Dictionary_icd_10_关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5964">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5965">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5966">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_updated分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5966">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5967">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5967">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5968">基于国际Dictionary_icd_10_codes分类、第十次修订、修订修改 ([ICD-10-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)) 关键字词典的任何术语。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5968">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5969">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5969">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5970">ICD-9-CM (国际) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5970">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5972">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5972">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5974">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5974">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5975">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5976">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5976">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5977">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5978">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5979">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5979">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5980">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_codes关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5980">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5981">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5982">找到来自Dictionary_icd_9_updated关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5982">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5983">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5983">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5984">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_updated分类、第九次修订、修订修改和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (关键字词典) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5984">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5985">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5985">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5986">基于国际Dictionary_icd_9_codes分类、第九次修订、修订和 [ICD-9-CM ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605) (的关键字词典中的) 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5986">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5987">此类型仅查找保险代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5987">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5988">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5988">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5989">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5989">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5990">IPv4：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5990">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5991">处理 IPv4 地址 (格式) 和无格式 (IPv4) 句点的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5991">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5992">IPv6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5992">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5993">包含带格式的 IPv6 号码的复杂 (包括冒号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5993">Complex pattern that accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5994">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5994">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5995">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5995">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5996">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5996">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5997">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5997">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5998">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5998">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-5999">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-5999">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6000">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6000">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6001">对于 IPv4，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6001">For IPv4, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6002">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6002">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6003">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6003">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6004">对于 IPv6，如果在 300 个字符的邻近度内，DLP 策略会高可信度地检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6004">For IPv6, a DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6005">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6005">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6006">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6006">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6007">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6007">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6008">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6008">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6009">此 (的 IP 关键字区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6009">IP (this keyword is case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6010">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6010">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6011">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6011">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6012">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6012">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6013">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6013">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6014">爱尔兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6014">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6015">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6015">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6016">六个数字后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6016">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6017">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6017">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6018">六个数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6018">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6019">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6019">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6020">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6020">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6021">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6022">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6023">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6024">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6024">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6025">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6025">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6026">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6149">ceadúnais tiom一a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6149">ceadúnais tiomána</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6150">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6150">Ireland passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6152">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6152">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6153">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6154">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6154">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6155">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6155">Two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6156">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6156">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6157">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6158">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6158">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6159">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6160">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6160">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6161">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6161">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6162">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6162">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6163">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字的日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6163">The regular expression `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 BEA/MAY 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6164">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6164">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6165">正则表达式查找  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6165">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6166">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6166">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="a2130f27-9ee2-4103-84f9-a6b1ee7d0cbf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6190">爱尔兰个人公共服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6190">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6192">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6192">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6193">七个数字后跟 1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6193">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6194">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6194">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6195">七个数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6195">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6196">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6197">2012 (2012 年 12 月 31) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6197">Old format (until 31 December 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6198">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6198">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6199">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6199">one to two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6200">2013 (1 月 1 日及之后的新) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6200">New format (1 January 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6201">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6201">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6202">字母 (不区分大小写) 字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6202">a letter (not case-sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6203">A-I 或"W"范围中的可选字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6203">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6204">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6204">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6205">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6205">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6206">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6206">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6207">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6207">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6208">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6208">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6209">找到来自Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6209">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6210">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6210">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6211">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6211">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6212">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6212">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6213">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6213">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6258">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6258">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6259">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6260">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6260">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6261">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6262">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6262">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6263">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6263">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6264">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6264">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6265">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6265">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6266">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6266">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6267">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6267">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6268">无格式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6268">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6269">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6269">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6270">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6271">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6272">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6273">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6273">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6274">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6274">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6275">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6275">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6276">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6276">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6277">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6277">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6278">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6278">Bank Account Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6280">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6280">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6281">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6281">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6282">以色列国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6282">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6283">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6283">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6284">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6284">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6285">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6285">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6286">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6286">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6287">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6287">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6288">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6288">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6289">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6289">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6290">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6290">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6291">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6291">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6292">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6292">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6293">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6293">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6312">意大利驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6312">Italy driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6313">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驾驶证号码敏感信息类型中，并作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6313">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6314">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6314">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6315">10 个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6315">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6316">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6316">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6317">10 个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6317">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6318">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6318">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6319">字母"A"或"V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6319">the letter "A" or "V" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6320">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6320">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6321">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6321">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6322">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6322">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6323">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6323">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6324">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6324">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6325">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6325">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6326">正则表达式查找 `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6326">The regular expression `Regex_italy_drivers_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6327">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6327">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
    <Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6454">意大利财政代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6454">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6455">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6455">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6456">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6456">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6457">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6457">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6458">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6458">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6459">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6459">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6460">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6460">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6461">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6461">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6462">指定模式中字母和数字的 16 个字符组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6462">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6463">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6463">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6464">字母和数字的 16 个字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6464">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6465">三个字母，对应于系列名称中的前三个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6465">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6466">三个字母，分别对应名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6466">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6467">两个数字，对应于出生日期的最后一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6467">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6468">一个对应于出生日期月份字母的字母 - 字母按字母顺序使用，但只有字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 到 T (因此，January 为 A，10 月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6468">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (so, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6469">与出生日期对应的两个数字-为了区分性别，将 40 位添加到女士的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6469">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6470">四个数字，对应于特定的地区代码，该人的 (国家/地区代码用于国家/地区) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6470">four digits that correspond to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6471">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6471">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6472">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6472">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6473">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6473">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6474">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6474">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6475">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6475">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6476">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6476">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6477">找到 的  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6477">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6478">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6478">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6479">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6479">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6514">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6514">Italy passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6515">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6515">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6516">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6516">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6517">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6517">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6518">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6518">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6519">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6519">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6520">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6520">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6521">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6521">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6522">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6522">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6523">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6523">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6524">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6524">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6525">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6525">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6526">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6526">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6527">正则表达式查找格式为 `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (示例 - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6527">The regular expression `Regex_italy_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 01 GEN/JAN 1988) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6528">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6528">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6529">正则表达式查找  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6529">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6530">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6530">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="39811019-4750-445f-b26d-4c0e6c431544" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6554">意大利增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6554">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6555">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6555">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6556">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6556">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6557">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6557">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6558">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6558">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6559">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6559">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6560">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6560">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6561">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6561">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6562">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6562">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6563">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6563">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6564">带可选分隔符的 13 个字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6564">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6565">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6565">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6566">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6566">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6567">可选空格、点、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6567">optional space, dot, hyphen, or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6568">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6568">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6569">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6569">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6570">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6570">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6571">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6571">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6572">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6572">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6573">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6573">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6574">找到来自Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6574">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6575">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6575">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6576">函数Func_italy_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6576">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6577">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6577">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6584">日本银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6584">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6585">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6585">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6586">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6586">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6587">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6587">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6588">bank account number：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6588">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6589">七个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6589">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6590">bank account branch code：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6590">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6591">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6591">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6592">一个空格或 (划线) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6592">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6593">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6593">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6594">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6594">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6595">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6595">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6596">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6596">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6597">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6597">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6598">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6598">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6599">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6599">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6600">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6600">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6601">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6601">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6602">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6602">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6603">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6603">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6604">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6604">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6605">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6605">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6652">日本驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6652">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6654">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6654">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6655">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6656">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6656">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6657">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6657">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6658">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6658">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6659">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6659">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6660">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6660">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6661">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6661">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6662">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6662">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6700">日本我的号码 - 公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6700">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6701">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6701">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6702">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6702">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6703">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6703">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6704">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6704">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6705">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6705">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6706">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6706">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6707">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6707">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6708">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6708">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6709">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6709">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6710">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6710">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6711">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6711">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6712">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6712">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6713">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6713">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6714">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6714">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6715">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6715">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6716">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6716">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6717">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6717">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6718">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6718">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6719">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6719">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6720">函数Func_japanese_my_number_corporate查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6720">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6733">日本我的号码 - 个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6733">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6734">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6734">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6735">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6735">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6736">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6736">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6737">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6737">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6738">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6738">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6739">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6739">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6740">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6740">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6741">12 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6741">12-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6742">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6742">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6743">12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6743">12-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6744">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6744">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6745">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6745">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6746">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6746">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6747">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6747">an optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6748">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6748">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6749">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6749">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6750">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6750">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6751">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6751">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6752">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6752">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6753">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6753">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6754">找到来自Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6754">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6755">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6755">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6756">函数Func_japanese_my_number_personal查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6756">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
