## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6769">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6769">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6770">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6770">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6771">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6771">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6772">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6772">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6773">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6773">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6774">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6774">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6775">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6775">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6776">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6776">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6777">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6777">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6778">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6778">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6779">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6779">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6796">日本居民身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6796">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6798">12 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6798">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6799">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6800">12 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6800">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6801">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6801">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6802">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6802">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6803">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6803">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6805">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6805">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6807">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6807">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6808">正则表达式Regex_jp_residence_card_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6808">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6809">找到来自Keyword_jp_residence_card_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6809">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6810">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6810">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6814">居住卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6814">Residence card #</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6818">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6818">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6819">Format</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6823">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6823">Checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6825">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6826">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6826">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6827">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6827">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6828">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6828">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6841">日本社会保险号码 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6841">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6842">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6843">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6843">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6844">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6844">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6845">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6845">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6846">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6846">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6847">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6847">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6848">六个数字 OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6848">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6849">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6849">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6850">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6850">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6851">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6851">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6852">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6852">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6853">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6853">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6854">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6854">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6855">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6855">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6856">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6856">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6857">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6857">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6858">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6858">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6879">拉脱维亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6879">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6881">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6881">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6883">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6883">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6884">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6884">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6885">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6885">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6886">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6886">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6887">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6887">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6888">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6888">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6889">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6889">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6890">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6890">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-6891">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-6891">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7016">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7016">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7017">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7017">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7018">11 个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7018">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7019">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7019">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7020">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7020">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7021">11 个数字和连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7021">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7022">六个数字，对应于 DDMMYY (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7022">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7023">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7023">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7024">一个数字，对应于 19 世纪 ("0"、20 世纪对应"1"和"21 世纪") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7024">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7025">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7025">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7026">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7026">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7027">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7027">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7028">两个数字"32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7028">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7029">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7029">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7030">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7030">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7031">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7031">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7032">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7032">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7033">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7033">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7034">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7034">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7035">找到 的  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7035">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7036">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7036">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7037">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7037">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7100">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7100">Latvia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7102">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字（没有空格或分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7102">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7103">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7104">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7104">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7105">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7105">two digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7106">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7106">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7107">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7108">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7108">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7109">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7110">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7111">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7111">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7112">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7113">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7113">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7114">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7114">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7115">正则表达式查找  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7115">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7116">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7116">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="23ae25ec-cc28-421b-b77a-3054eadf1ede" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7139">立陶宛驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7139">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7140">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7140">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7141">八个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7141">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7142">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7142">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7143">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7143">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7144">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7144">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7145">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7145">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7146">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7146">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7147">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7147">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7148">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7148">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7149">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7149">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7274">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7274">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7275">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7275">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7276">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7276">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7277">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7277">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7278">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7278">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7279">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7279">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7280">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7280">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7282">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7282">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7283">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7284">11 个数字，不带空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7284">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7285">一个数字 (1-6) 对应于性别和出生日期的世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7285">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7286">六个数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7286">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7287">三个数字，对应于出生日期的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7287">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7288">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7288">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7289">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7290">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7290">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7291">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7292">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7292">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7293">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7293">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7294">找到 的  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7294">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7295">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7295">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7296">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7296">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7331">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7331">Lithuania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7332">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7333">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7333">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7334">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7335">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7335">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7336">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7337">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7337">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7338">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7339">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7339">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7340">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7340">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7341">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7341">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7342">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7342">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7343">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7343">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7344">正则表达式查找  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7344">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7345">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7345">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="1b79900f-047b-4c3f-846f-7d73b5534bce" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7365">百度达驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7365">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7366">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7366">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7367">6 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7367">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7368">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7368">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7369">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7369">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7370">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7370">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7371">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7371">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7372">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7372">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7373">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7373">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7374">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7374">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7375">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7375">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7499"> (的自然人的) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7499">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7500">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7500">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7501">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7501">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7502">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7502">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7503">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7503">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7504">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7504">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7505">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7505">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7507">13 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7507">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7509">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7509">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7510">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7510">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7511">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7511">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7513">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7513">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7515">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7515">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7516">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7516">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7517">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7517">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7518">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7518">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7519">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7519">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7542">百里达护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7542">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7543">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7543">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7544">八个数字或字母，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7544">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7545">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7545">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7546">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7546">eight digits or letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7547">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7547">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7548">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7548">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7549">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7549">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7550">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7550">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7551">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7551">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7552">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7552">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7553">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date3` 格式为 DD MM YYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7553">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date3` finds date in the format DD MM YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7554">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7554">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7555">正则表达式查找  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7555">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7556">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7556">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="81d5c027-bed9-4421-91a0-3b2e55b3eb85" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date3" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7588">阿比塞卡 (非自然人的身份证号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7588">Luxemburg national identification number (non-natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7589">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7589">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7590">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7590">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7591">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7591">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7592">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7592">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7593">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7594">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7594">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7595">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7595">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7596">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7596">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7597">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7597">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7598">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7598">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7599">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7599">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7600">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7600">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7601">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7601">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7602">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7602">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7603">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7603">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7604">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7604">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7605">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7605">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7606">找到 的  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7606">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7607">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7607">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7608">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7608">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7648">马来西亚身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7648">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7649">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7649">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7650">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7650">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7651">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7651">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7652">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7652">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7653">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7653">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7654">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7654">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7655">双字母的出生日期位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7655">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7656">划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7656">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7657">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7657">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7658">一位数性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7658">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7659">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7660">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7661">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7662">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7662">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7663">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7663">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7664">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7664">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7691">马耳他驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7691">Malta driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7692">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7692">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7693">指定模式中两个字符和六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7693">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7694">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7694">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7695">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7695">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7696">两个字符 (数字或字母，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7696">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7697">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7697">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7698">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7698">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7699">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7699">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7700">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7700">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7701">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7701">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7702">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7702">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7703">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7703">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7704">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7704">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7705">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7705">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7706">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7706">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7830">马耳他身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7830">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7831">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7831">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7832">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7832">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7833">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7833">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7834">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7834">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7835">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7835">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7836">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7836">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7837">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7837">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7838">七个数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7838">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7839">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7839">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7840">七个数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7840">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7841">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7841">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7842">"M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z"中的一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7842">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7843">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7843">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7844">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7844">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7845">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7845">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7846">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7846">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7847">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7847">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7848">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7848">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7849">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7849">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7850">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7850">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7867">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7867">Malta passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7869">七个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7869">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7870">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7871">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7871">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7872">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7873">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7874">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7875">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7876">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7876">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7877">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7877">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7878">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7878">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7879">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7879">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7880">正则表达式查找  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7880">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7881">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7881">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="b2b21198-48f9-4d13-b2a5-03969bff0fb8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7899">发行日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7899">date of issue</span></span>

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7901">马耳他税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7901">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7902">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7902">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7903">对于马耳他语：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7903">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7904">指定模式中的七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7904">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7905">非马耳他语公民和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7905">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7906">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7906">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7907">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7907">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7908">马耳他语：七个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7908">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7909">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7909">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7910">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7910">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7911">非马耳他公民和马耳他实体：9 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7911">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7912">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7912">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7913">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7913">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7914">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7914">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7915">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7915">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7916">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7916">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7917">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7917">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7918">找到 的  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7918">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7919">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7919">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7920">正则表达式或  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7920">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="medicare-beneficiary-identifier-mbi-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7953">一个 MBI (的) 标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7953">Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7954">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7954">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7955">十二字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7955">eleven character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7956">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7956">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7957">1 到 9 之间的一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7957">one digit between 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7958">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7958">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7959">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7959">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7960">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7960">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7961">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7961">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7962">一个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7962">one letter excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7963">一个数字或字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7963">one digit or letter excluding S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7964">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7964">one digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7965">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7965">an optional Hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7966">两个字母，不包括 S、L、O、I、B、Z</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7966">two letters excluding  S, L, O, I, B, Z</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7967">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7967">two digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7968">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7968">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7969">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7969">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7970">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7970">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7971">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7971">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7972">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7972">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7973">找到 的  `Keyword_mbi_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7973">A keyword from  `Keyword_mbi_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7974">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7974">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7975">正则表达式查找  `Regex_mbi_card` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7975">The regular expression  `Regex_mbi_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Medicare Beneficiary Identifier (MBI) card -->
      <Entity id="f753a286-f5cc-47e6-a592-4be25fd02591" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_mbi_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7976">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7976">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_mbi_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7977">Keyword_mbi_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7978">mbi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7978">mbi</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7979">mbi#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7979">mbi#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7980">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7980">medicare beneficiary #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7981">一个优势标识符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7981">medicare beneficiary identifier</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7982">一名受益者否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7982">medicare beneficiary no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7983">一名收入者编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7983">medicare beneficiary number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7984">一名收入#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7984">medicare beneficiary#</span></span>


## <a name="mexico-unique-population-registry-code-curp"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7985">墨西哥唯一总体注册表代码 (CURP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7985">Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7987">18 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7987">18 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7988">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7988">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7989">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7989">four letters (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7990">六个数字，表示有效日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7990">six digits indicating a valid date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7991">字母 - H/h 或 M/m</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7991">a letter - H/h or M/m</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7992">指示有效"墨西哥"状态代码的两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7992">two letters indicating a valid Mexican state code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7993">三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7993">three letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7994">一个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7994">one letter or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7995">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7995">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7996">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7996">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7997">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7997">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7998">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7998">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-7999">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-7999">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8000">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8000">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8001">找到 的  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8001">A keyword from  `Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8002">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8002">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8003">函数  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8003">The function  `Func_mexico_population_registry_code` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
    <!-- Mexico Unique Population Registry Code (CURP) -->
      <Entity id="e905ad4d-5a74-406d-bf36-b1efca798af4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_mexico_population_registry_code" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
