## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8024">荷兰公民服务号码 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8024">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8025">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8025">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8026">包含可选空格的八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8026">eight or nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8027">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8027">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8028">八个九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8028">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8029">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8029">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8030">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8030">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8031">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8031">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8032">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8032">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8033">2-3 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8033">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8034">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8034">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8035">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8035">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8036">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8036">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8037">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8037">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8038">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8038">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8039">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8039">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8040">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8040">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8064">荷兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8064">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8066">10 个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8066">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8067">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8068">十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8068">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8069">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8069">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8070">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8070">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8071">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8071">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8072">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8072">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8073">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8073">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8074">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8074">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8202">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8202">Netherlands passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8204">九个字母或数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8204">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8205">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8206">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8206">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8207">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8208">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8208">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8209">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8210">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8210">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8211">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8211">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8212">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8212">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8213">正则表达式查找格式 `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` 为 DD MMM/MMM YYYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8213">The regular expression `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format  DD MMM/MMM YYYY (Example - 26 MAA/MAR 2012)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8214">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8215">正则表达式查找  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8215">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8216">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8216">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="61786727-bafd-45f6-94d9-888d815e228e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8234">荷兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8234">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8235">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8235">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8236">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8236">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8237">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8237">communication compliance policies</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8239">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8239">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8240">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8240">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8241">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8241">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8242">九个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8242">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8243">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8243">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8244">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8244">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8245">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8245">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8246">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8246">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8247">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8247">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8248">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8248">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8249">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8249">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8250">找到 的  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8250">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8251">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8251">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8252">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8252">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8290">荷兰增值税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8290">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8291">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8291">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8292">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8292">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8293">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8293">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8294">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8294">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8295">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8295">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8296">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8296">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8297">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8297">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8298">14 个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8298">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8299">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8299">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8300">14 字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8300">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8301">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8301">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8302">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8302">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8303">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8303">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8304">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8304">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8305">可选空格、点或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8305">optional space, dot, or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8306">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8306">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8307">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8307">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8308">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8309">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8310">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8311">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8311">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8312">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8312">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8313">找到来自Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8313">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8314">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8314">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8315">函数Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8315">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8316">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8316">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8317">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8317">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8322">btw n与mer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8322">btw nûmer</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8324">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8324">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8325">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8325">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8326">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8326">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8327">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8327">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8328">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8328">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8329">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8329">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8330">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8330">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8331">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8331">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8332">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8332">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8333">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8333">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8334">带可选分隔符的 14 位到 16 位模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8334">14-digit to 16-digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8335">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8335">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8336">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8336">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8337">三到四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8337">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8338">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8338">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8339">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8339">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8340">可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8340">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8341">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8341">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8342">选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8342">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8343">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8344">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8345">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8346">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8346">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8347">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8347">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8348">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8348">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8349">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8349">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8350">函数Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8350">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8358">新西兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8358">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8359">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8359">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8360">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8360">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8361">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8361">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8362">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8362">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8363">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8363">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8364">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8364">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8365">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8365">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8366">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8366">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8367">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8367">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8368">八个字符字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8368">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8369">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8369">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8370">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8370">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8371">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8372">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8372">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8373">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8374">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8374">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8375">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8375">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8376">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8376">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8377">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8377">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8378">函数Func_newzealand_driver_license_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8378">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8445">新西兰的收入数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8445">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8446">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8446">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8447">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8447">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8448">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8448">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8449">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8449">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8450">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8450">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8451">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8451">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8452">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8452">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8453">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8453">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8454">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8454">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8455">八个或九个数字（带可选分隔符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8455">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8456">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8456">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8457">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8457">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8458">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8458">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8459">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8459">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8460">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8460">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8461">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8461">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8462">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8462">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8463">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8463">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8464">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8464">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8465">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8465">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8466">找到来自Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8466">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8467">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8467">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8468">函数Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8468">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8470">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8470">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8477">新西兰卫生服务局号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8477">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8478">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8478">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8479">三个字母，一 (可选) 和四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8479">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8480">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8480">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8481">三个字母 (区分大小写) "I"和"O"除外</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8481">three letters (not case-sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8482">一个 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8482">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8483">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8483">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8484">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8485">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8485">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8486">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8487">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8487">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8488">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8488">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8489">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8489">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8490">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8490">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8491">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8492">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8492">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8493">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8493">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-social-welfare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8507">新西兰社会电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8507">New Zealand social welfare number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8508">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8508">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8509">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8509">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8510">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8510">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8511">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8511">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8512">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8512">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8513">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8513">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8515">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8515">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8516">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8517">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8517">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8518">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8518">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8519">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8519">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8520">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8520">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8521">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8521">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8522">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8522">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8523">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8524">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8525">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8526">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8526">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8527">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8527">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8528">找到来自Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8528">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8529">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8529">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8530">函数Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8530">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8531">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8532">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8532">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8533">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8533">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8534">社交 <2> <2> <3>#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8534">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8535">social一号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8535">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8536">social 时号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8536">social welfare number</span></span>

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8538">挪威标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8538">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8539">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8539">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8540">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8540">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8541">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8541">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8542">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8542">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8543">六个数字，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8543">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8544">三位数个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8544">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8545">两个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8545">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8546">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8546">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8547">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8547">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8548">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8548">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8549">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8549">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8550">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8550">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8551">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8551">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8552">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8552">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8553">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8553">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8554">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8554">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8555">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8555">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8556">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8556">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8557">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8557">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8560">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8560">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8561">标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8561">Identification</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8564">菲律宾统一的多用途标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8564">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8565">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8565">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8566">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8566">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8567">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8567">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8568">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8568">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8569">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8569">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8570">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8570">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8571">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8571">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8572">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8572">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8573">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8573">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8574">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8575">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8575">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8576">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8577">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8577">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8578">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8578">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8579">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8579">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8580">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8580">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8581">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8582">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8583">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8583">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8584">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8584">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8585">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8586">波兰驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8586">Poland driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8587">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8587">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8588">14 个数字，包含两个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8588">14 digits containing two forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8589">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8589">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8590">14 个数字和两个正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8590">14 digits and two forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8591">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8591">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8592">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8592">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8593">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8593">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8594">正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8594">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8595">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8595">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8596">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8596">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8597">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8597">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8598">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8598">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8599">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8599">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8600">正则表达式查找  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8600">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8601">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8601">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8725">波兰身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8725">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8726">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8726">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8727">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8727">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8728">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8728">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8729">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8729">three letters (not case-sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8730">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8731">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8731">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8732">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8733">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8733">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8734">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8734">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8735">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8735">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8736">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8736">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8737">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8737">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8738">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8738">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8741">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8742">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8742">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8743">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8743">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8744">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8744">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-p142">dow. os.
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-p142">dow. os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8747">波兰国家/ (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8747">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8748">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8749">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8749">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8750">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8750">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8751">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD 格式的出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8751">six digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8752">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8752">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8753">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8753">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8754">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8754">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8755">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8755">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8756">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8756">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8757">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8757">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8758">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8758">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8759">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8759">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8760">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8760">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8761">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8761">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8762">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8762">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8763">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8763">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8768">niepowtarzalny numer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8768">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8773">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8773">pesel</span></span>

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8775">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8775">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8776">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号码敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8776">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8777">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8777">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8778">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8778">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8779">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8779">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8780">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8780">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8781">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8781">Two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8782">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8783">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8783">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8784">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8785">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8785">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8786">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8786">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8787">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8787">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8788">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8788">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8789">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8789">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8790">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8790">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8791">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8791">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8792">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8792">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8793">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8793">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_polish_national_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8794">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8794">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8795">函数 `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8795">The function `Func_polish_passport_number_v2` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8796">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8796">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number_v2" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_polish_national_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8809">Keyword_polish_national_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8809">Keyword_polish_national_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8810">numer paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8810">numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8811">numery paszportów</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8811">numery paszportów</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8812">numery paszportowe</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8812">numery paszportowe</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8822">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8822">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8823">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8823">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8824">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8824">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8825">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8825">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8826">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8826">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8827">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8827">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8828">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8828">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8829">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8829">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8830">9 位数字或 14 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8830">9-digit or 14-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8831">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8831">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8832">九位数字或 14 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8832">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8833">九个数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8833">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8834">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8834">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8835">hyphen</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8835">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8836">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8836">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8837">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8837">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8838">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8838">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8839">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8839">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8840">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8840">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8841">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8841">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8842">找到来自Keywords_polish_regon_number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8842">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8843">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8843">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8844">函数Func_polish_regon_number查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8844">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_poland_regon_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8846">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8846">Keywords_poland_regon_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8847">regon id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8847">regon id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8849">统计 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8849">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8850">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8850">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8851">regon number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8851">regon number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8852">reg一维#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8852">regonid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8853">regonno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8853">regonno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8854">公司 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8854">company id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8855">companyid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8855">companyid#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8857">numer statystyczny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8857">numer statystyczny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8858">numeru regon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8858">numeru regon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8859">numerstatystyczny#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8859">numerstatystyczny#</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8861">波兰税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8861">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8862">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8863">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8864">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8864">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8865">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8865">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8866">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8867">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8869">11 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8869">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8870">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8871">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8871">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8872">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8873">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8874">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8875">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8875">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8876">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8876">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8877">找到 的  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8907">葡萄牙公民卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8907">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8908">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8908">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8909">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8909">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8910">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8910">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8911">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8911">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8912">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8913">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8913">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8914">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8915">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8915">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8916">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8916">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8917">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8917">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8920">将 de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8920">bilhete de identidade</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8922">citizen card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8922">citizen card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8923">文档编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8923">document number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8926">identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8926">identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8927">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8927">identification number</span></span>
