## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8937">葡萄牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8937">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8939">两个模式 - 两个字母后跟 5-8 个数字（带特殊字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8939">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8941">模式 1：两个字母后跟 5/6 特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8941">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8942">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8942">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8943">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8943">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8944">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8944">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8945">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8945">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8946">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8946">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8947">模式 2：一个字母后跟 6/8 个数字（带特殊字符）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8947">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8948">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8948">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8949">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8949">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8950">六个或八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8950">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8951">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8951">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8952">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8952">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8953">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8953">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8954">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8954">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8955">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8955">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8956">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8956">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8957">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8957">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-8958">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-8958">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9090">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9090">Portugal passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9091">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9091">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9092">一个字母后跟 6 个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9092">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9093">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9093">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9094">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9094">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9095">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9095">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9096">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9096">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9097">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9098">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9098">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9099">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9100">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9100">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9101">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9101">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9102">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9102">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9103">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9103">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9104">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9104">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9105">正则表达式查找  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9105">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9106">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9106">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="080a52fd-a7bc-431e-b54d-51f08f59db11" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9133">葡萄牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9133">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9134">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9134">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9135">九个数字（带可选空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9135">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9136">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9136">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9137">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9137">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9138">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9138">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9139">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9139">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9140">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9140">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9141">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9141">three digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9142">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9143">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9143">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9144">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9145">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9145">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9146">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9146">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9147">找到 的  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9147">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9148">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9148">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9149">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9149">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9174">罗马尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9174">Romania driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9175">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9176">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9176">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9177">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9178">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9178">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9179">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9179">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9180">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9180">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9181">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9181">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9182">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9182">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9183">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9183">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9184">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9184">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9185">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9185">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9186">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9186">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9314">使用 CNP (罗马尼亚个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9314">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9315">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9315">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9316">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9316">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9317">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9317">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9318">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9318">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9319">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9319">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9320">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9320">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9321">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9322">不带空格和分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9322">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9323">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9323">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9324">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9324">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9325">六个数字，表示 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9325">six digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9326">两个数字，可以是 01-52 或 99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9326">two digits, which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9327">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9327">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9328">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9329">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9329">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9330">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9331">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9331">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9332">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9332">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9333">找到 的  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9333">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9334">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9334">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9335">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9335">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9386">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9386">Romania passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9388">八个或九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9388">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9390">八个或九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9390">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9391">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9391">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9392">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9392">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9393">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9393">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9394">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9394">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9395">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9395">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9396">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9396">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9397">正则表达式查找 `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY 格式的日期 (示例- 01 2 月/2 月 10) 或找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9397">The regular expression `Regex_romania_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (Example- 01 FEB/FEB 10) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9398">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9398">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9399">正则表达式查找  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9399">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9400">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9400">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="5d31b90c-7fe2-4a76-a14b-767b8fd19d6c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9418">俄罗斯护照号码国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9418">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9419">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9419">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9420">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9420">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9421">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9421">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9422">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9422">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9423">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9423">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9424">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9424">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9426">10 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9426">10-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9428">10 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9428">10-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9429">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9429">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9430">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9430">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9431">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9431">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9432">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9432">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9433">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9433">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9434">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9434">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9435">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9435">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9436">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9437">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9437">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9438">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9438">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9439">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9439">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9458">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9458">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9459">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9459">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9460">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9460">information governance</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9463">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9463">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9465">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9465">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9468">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9468">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9469">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9469">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9470">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9470">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9471">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9471">No</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9473">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9473">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9474">正则表达式Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9474">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9475">找到来自Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9475">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml

      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">

        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9492">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9492">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9493">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9493">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9494">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9494">10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9495">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9495">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9496">10 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9496">10 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9497">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9497">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9498">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9498">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9499">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9499">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9500">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9500">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9501">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9501">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9502">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9502">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9503">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9503">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9504">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9504">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9505">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9505">Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9506">I card number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9506">I card number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9507">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9507">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9508">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9508">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9509">新加坡国家注册身份证号码 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9509">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9510">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9510">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9511">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9511">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9512">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9512">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9513">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9513">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9514">字母"F"、"G"、"S"或"T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9514">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9515">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9515">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9516">字母检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9516">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9517">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9518">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9519">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9520">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9521">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9521">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9522">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9522">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9523">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9524">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9525">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9525">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9526">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9530">Identity Card Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9530">Identity Card Number</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9537">斯洛伐克驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9537">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9539">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9539">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9541">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9541">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9542">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9542">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9543">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9543">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9544">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9545">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9545">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9546">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9547">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9547">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9548">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9548">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9549">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9549">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9675">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9675">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9676">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9676">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9677">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9677">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9678">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9678">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9679">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9679">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9680">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9680">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9681">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9681">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9683">九个或十个数字，包含可选反杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9683">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9684">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9685">六个数字，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9685">six digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9686">可选斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9686">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9687">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9687">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9688">一个可选检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9688">one optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9689">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9690">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9690">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9691">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9692">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9692">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9693">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9693">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9694">找到 的  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9694">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9695">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9695">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9696">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9696">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9743">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9743">Slovakia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9745">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9745">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9747">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9747">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9748">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9748">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9749">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9749">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9750">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9750">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9751">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9751">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9752">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9752">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9753">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9753">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9754">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9754">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9755">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9755">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9756">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9756">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9757">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9757">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="238e1f08-d80e-4793-af33-9b57918335b7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9779">斯洛文尼亚驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9779">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9780">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9780">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9781">九个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9781">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9782">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9782">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9783">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9783">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9784">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9785">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9785">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9786">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9787">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9787">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9788">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9788">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9789">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9789">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9916">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9916">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9917">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9917">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9918">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9918">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9919">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9919">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9920">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9920">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9921">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9921">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9922">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9922">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9923">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9923">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9924">不带空格或分隔符的 13 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9924">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9925">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9925">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9926">指定模式中的 13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9926">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9927">对应于出生日期的七个数字 (DDMMLLL) 其中"LLL"对应于出生日期的最后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9927">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9928">两个数字，对应于出生日期"50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9928">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9929">三个数字，分别对应同一天男性的性别和序列号组合 (000-499 和 500-999（对于男性) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9929">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9930">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9930">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9931">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9932">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9932">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9933">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9934">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9934">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9935">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9935">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9936">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9936">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9937">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9937">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9938">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9938">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9966">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9966">Slovenia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9968">两个字母后跟七个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9968">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9969">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9970">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9970">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9971">字母"P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9971">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9972">一个小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9972">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9973">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9973">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9975">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9975">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9977">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9977">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9978">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9978">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9979">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9979">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9980">正则表达式查找 `Regex_eu_passport_date1` 格式为 DD.MM.YYYYY 的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9980">The regular expression `Regex_eu_passport_date1` finds date in the format DD.MM.YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9981">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9982">正则表达式查找  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9982">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-9983">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="235b7976-7bbe-4df5-bb40-08678e749d1a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_eu_passport_date1" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10006">斯洛文尼亚税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10006">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10007">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10007">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10008">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10008">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10009">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10009">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10010">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10010">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10011">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10011">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10012">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10012">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10014">八个数字，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10014">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10015">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10015">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10016">一个数字，从 1 到 9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10016">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10017">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10017">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10018">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10018">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10019">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10019">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10020">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10020">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10021">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10021">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10022">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10022">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10023">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10023">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10024">找到 的  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10024">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10025">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10025">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10026">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10026">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10050">南非标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10050">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10051">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10052">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10052">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10053">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10054">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10054">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10055">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10055">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10056">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10056">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10057">单数字公民指示符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10057">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10058">数字"8"或"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10058">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10059">一个数字，即校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10059">one digit, which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10060">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10061">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10062">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10063">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10063">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10064">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10064">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10065">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10065">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10066">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10066">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10067">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10067">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10068">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10068">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10072">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10072">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10073">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10073">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10074">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10074">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10075">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10075">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10076">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10076">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10077">六个数字，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10077">six digits in the format YYMMDD, which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10078">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10078">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10079">一个数字，由世纪和性别决定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10079">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10080">四位数的出生日期区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10080">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10081">一个数字，用于区分前面数字完全相同的人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10081">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10082">一个检查数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10082">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10083">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10083">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10084">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10084">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10085">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10085">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10086">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10086">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10087">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10087">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10088">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10088">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10089">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10089">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10090">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10090">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10091">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10091">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10092">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10092">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10093">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10093">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10094">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10095">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10095">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10096">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10096">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10097">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10097">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10098">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10098">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10099">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10099">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10100">西班牙驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10100">Spain driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10101">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10101">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10102">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10102">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10103">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10103">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10104">八个数字后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10104">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10105">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10105">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10106">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10106">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10107">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10107">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10108">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10108">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10109">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10109">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10110">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10110">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10111">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10111">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10112">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10112">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10113">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10113">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10114">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10114">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
