## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10248">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10248">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10249">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10249">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10250">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10250">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10251">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10251">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10252">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10252">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10253">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10253">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10254">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10254">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10255">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10255">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10256">八个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10256">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10257">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10257">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10258">七个数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10258">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10259">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10259">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10260">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10260">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10261">一个检查 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10261">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10262">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10262">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10263">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10263">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10264">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10264">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10265">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10265">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10266">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10266">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10267">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10267">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10268">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10268">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10269">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10269">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10293">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10293">Spain passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10294">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10294">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10295">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合，无空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10295">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10296">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10296">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10297">字母和数字的八字符或九字符组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10297">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10298">两个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10298">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10299">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10299">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10300">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10300">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10301">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10301">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10302">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10302">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10303">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10303">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10304">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10304">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10305">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10305">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10306">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10306">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10307">正则表达式查找 `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` DD-MM-YYYY 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10307">The regular expression `Regex_spain_eu_passport_date` finds date in the format DD-MM-YYYY or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10308">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10308">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10309">正则表达式查找  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10309">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10310">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10310">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Passport Number -->
      <Entity id="d17a57de-9fa5-4e9f-85d3-85c26d89686e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10339">西班牙社会保险号码 (SSN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10339">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10340">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10340">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10341">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10341">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10342">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10342">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10343">11-12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10343">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10344">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10344">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10345">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10345">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10346">七到八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10346">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10347">可选参数， (正斜) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10347">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10348">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10348">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10349">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10349">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10350">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10350">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10351">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10351">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10352">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10352">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10353">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10353">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10354">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10354">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10355">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10355">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10356">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10356">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10357">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10357">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10358">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10358">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- Spain SSN -->
    <Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10367">西班牙税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10367">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10368">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10368">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10369">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10369">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10370">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10370">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10371">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10371">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10372">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10372">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10373">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10373">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10374">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10374">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10375">七个或八个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10375">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10376">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10376">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10377">具有西班牙国家身份证的西班牙自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10377">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10378">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10378">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10379">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10379">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10380">没有西班牙国家身份证的非常驻 Spaniards</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10380">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10381">一个小写字母"L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10381">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10382">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10382">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10383">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10383">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10384">没有西班牙国家身份证的 14 岁以下的儿童的常驻 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10384">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10385">一个小写字母"K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10385">one uppercase letter "K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10386">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10386">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10387">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10387">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10388">具有一位用户标识号的百位用户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10388">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10389">一个小写字母，"X"、"Y"或"Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10389">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10390">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10390">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10391">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10391">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10392">没有标识号的百分卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10392">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10393">一个区分大小写的大写字母 ("M") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10393">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10394">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10394">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10395">一个小写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10395">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10397">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10397">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10399">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10399">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10400">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10400">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10401">找到 的  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10401">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10402">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10402">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10403">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10403">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10434">SQL Server连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10434">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10436">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"后跟以下模式中列出的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10436">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10437">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10437">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10438">字符串"用户 ID"、"用户 ID"、"uid"或"UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10438">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10439">1-200 个小写字母或大写字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10439">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10440">字符串"Password"或"pwd"，其中"pwd"的前面没有小写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10440">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" isn't preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10441">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10441">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10442">任何不是美元符号的字符 ($) 、百分比符号 (%) 、大于符号 (>) 、符号 (@) 、引号 (") 、分号 (;) 、左大括号 ([) 或左括号 ({) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10442">any character that isn't a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10443">7-128 个字符的任意组合，这些字符不是分号 (;) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10443">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10444">分号 (;) 或引号 (") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10444">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10445">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10445">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10446">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10446">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10447">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10447">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10448">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10448">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10449">正则表达式CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10449">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10450">未找到CEP_GlobalFilter关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10450">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter isn't found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10451">正则表达式CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10451">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10452">正则表达式CEP_CommonExampleKeywords找不到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10452">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords doesn't find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10480">瑞典驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10480">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10481">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10482">包含连字符的十个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10482">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10483">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10484">包含连字符的十个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10484">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10485">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10485">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10486">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10486">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10487">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10487">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10488">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10489">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10489">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10490">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10491">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10491">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10492">正则表达式查找  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10492">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10493">找到 或  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10493">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10626">瑞典国家/身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10626">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10627">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10627">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10628">10 个或 12 个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10628">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10629">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10629">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10630">10 或 12 位数字和可选的分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10630">10 or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10631">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10631">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10632">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10632">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10633">可选参数"-"或"+" () </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10633">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10634">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10634">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10635">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10636">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10636">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10637">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10638">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10638">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10639">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10639">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10640">找到的 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10640">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10641">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10641">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10642">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10642">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10643">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10643">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10644">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10644">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10663">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10663">Sweden passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10664">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10664">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10665">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10665">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10666">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10666">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10667">八个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10667">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10668">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10668">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10669">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10669">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10670">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10670">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10671">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10671">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10672">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10672">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10673">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10673">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10674">正则表达式查找 `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) 格式的日期或找到 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10674">the regular expression `Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date` finds a date in the format DD MMM/MMM YY (01 JAN/JAN 12) or a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10675">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10675">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10676">正则表达式Regex_sweden_passport_number找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10676">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10677">找到或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keyword_sweden_passport` 找到的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10677">a keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keyword_sweden_passport` is found.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_passport_date" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10678">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10678">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10680">passport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10680">passport#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10682">passportid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10682">passportid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10683">passports</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10683">passports</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10713">瑞典税务标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10713">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10714">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10714">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10715">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10715">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10716">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10716">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10717">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10717">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10718">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10718">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10719">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10719">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10720">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10720">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10721">10 个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10721">10 digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10722">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10722">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10723">10 个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10723">10 digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10724">六个数字，对应于 YYMMDD (出生日期) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10724">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10725">加号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10725">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10726">使标识号唯一的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10726">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10727">对于 1990 以前颁发的数字，第七位和第八位标识出生日期或出生日期的县</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10727">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10728">第九个位置的数字表示性别（男性为奇数或偶数）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10728">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10729">一个检查数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10729">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10730">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10730">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10731">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10731">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10732">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10732">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10733">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10733">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10734">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10734">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10735">找到 的  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10735">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10736">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10736">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10737">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10737">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10763">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10763">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10764">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10764">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10765">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10765">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10766">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10766">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10767">四个字母后跟 5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10767">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10768">四个字母银行 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10768">four-letter bank code (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10769">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10769">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10770">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10770">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10771">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10771">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10772">BBAN (一到三个字母或) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10772">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10773">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10773">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10774">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10774">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10775">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10775">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10776">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10776">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10777">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10777">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10778">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10778">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10815">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10815">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10816">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10816">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10817">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10817">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10818">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10818">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10819">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10819">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10820">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10820">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10821">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10821">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10822">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10823">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10823">13-digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10824">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10825">13 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10825">13-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10826">三个数字 - 756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10826">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10827">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10827">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10828">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10829">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10829">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10830">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10830">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10831">可选点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10831">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10832">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10832">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10833">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10833">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10834">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10834">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10835">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10835">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10836">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10836">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10837">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10837">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10838">找到来自Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10838">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10839">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10839">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10840">函数Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10840">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10849">个人 ID 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10849">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10850">个人标识号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10850">personal identification no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10851">insuranceno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10851">insuranceno#</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10861">台湾国家/地区身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10861">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10862">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10862">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10863">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10863">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10864">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10864">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10865">一个字母 (英文) 后跟九个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10865">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10866">一个字母 (英语，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10866">one letter (in English, not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10867">数字"1"或"2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10867">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10868">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10868">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10869">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10869">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10870">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10870">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10871">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10871">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10872">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10872">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10873">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10873">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10874">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10874">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10875">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10875">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10876">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10876">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10877">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10877">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10878">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10878">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10880">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10880">Keyword_taiwan_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10882">身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10882">身份證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10883">身份證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10883">身份證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10884">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10884">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10885">身分證字號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10885">身分證字號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10886">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10886">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10887">身分證號碼</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10887">身分證號碼</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10888">身份證號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10888">身份證號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10889">身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10889">身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10890">國民身分證統一編號</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10890">國民身分證統一編號</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10891">簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10891">簽名</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10892">蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10892">蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10893">簽名或蓋章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10893">簽名或蓋章</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10894">簽章</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10894">簽章</span></span>   
   
## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10895">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10895">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10896">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10896">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10897">生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10897">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10898">非生物识别护照号码：九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10898">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10899">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10899">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10900">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10900">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10901">字符"3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10901">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10902">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10902">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10903">非生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10903">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10904">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10904">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10905">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10906">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10906">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10907">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10908">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10908">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10909">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10909">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10910">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10910">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10911">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10911">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10912">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10912">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10913">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10913">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10914">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10914">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10915">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10915">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10916">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10916">Passport Num</span></span>

## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10921">中国台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10921">Taiwan-resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10923">10 letters and digits</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10923">10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10924">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10925">10 个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10925">10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10926">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10926">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10927">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10927">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10928">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10928">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10929">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10929">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10930">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10930">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10931">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10931">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10932">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10932">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10933">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10933">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10934">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10934">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10935">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10935">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10936">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10936">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10937">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10937">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10938">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10938">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10939">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10939">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10940">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10940">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10941">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10941">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10942">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10942">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10943">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10943">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10944">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10944">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10945">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10945">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10946">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10946">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10947">泰语总体标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10947">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10948">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10949">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10949">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10950">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10951">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10951">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10952">第一个数字不为零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10952">first digit isn't zero or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10953">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10953">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10954">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10954">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10955">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10955">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10956">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10956">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10957">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10957">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10958">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10958">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10959">找到来自Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10959">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10960">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10960">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10961">函数Func_Thai_Citizen_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10961">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10964">ID 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10964">ID Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10966">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10966">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10967">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10967">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10968">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10968">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10969">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10969">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10970">土耳其国家标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10970">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10972">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10972">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10974">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10974">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10975">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10975">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10976">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10976">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10977">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10977">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10978">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10978">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10979">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10979">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10980">找到来自Keyword_Turkish_National_Id关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10980">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10981">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10981">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10982">函数Func_Turkish_National_Id查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10982">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10983">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10983">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10984">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10984">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10985">TC Kim且否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10985">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10986">TC Kim且 nu一</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10986">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10987">Vatandailal？k nu一s？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10987">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10988">Vat一体车 no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10988">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10989">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10989">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10990">driver's license number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10990">driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10991">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10991">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10992">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10992">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10993">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10993">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10994">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10994">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10995">五个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10995">Five letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10996">一个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10996">One digit.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10997">日期格式 MMDDY 表示出生日期的五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10997">Five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10998">如果驱动程序是男性，则第七个字符将递增 50;对于考试，51 到 62，而不是 01 到 12。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10998">The seventh character is incremented by 50 if driver is female; for exampe, 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-10999">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字"9"来表示字母。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-10999">Two letters (not case-sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11000">五个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11000">Five digits.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11001">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11001">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11002">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11002">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11003">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11003">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11004">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11004">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11005">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11005">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11006">找到 的 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11006">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11007">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11007">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11008">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11008">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11009">函数 `Func_uk_drivers_license` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11009">The function `Func_uk_drivers_license` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11010">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11010">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true" >
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11011">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11011">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11012">Keywords_eu_driver s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11012">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11013">driverlic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11013">driverlic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11014">driverlics</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11014">driverlics</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11015">driverlicense</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11015">driverlicense</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11016">driverlicenses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11016">driverlicenses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11017">driverlicence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11017">driverlicence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11018">driverlicences</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11018">driverlicences</span></span>
