## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11131">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11131">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11132">roll roll number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11132">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11133">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11133">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11134">两个字母后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11134">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11135">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11135">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11136">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟 1-4 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11136">two letters (not case-sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11137">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11137">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11138">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11138">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11139">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11139">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11140">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11140">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11141">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11141">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11142">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11142">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11143">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11143">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11144">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11145">council nomination</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11145">council nomination</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11146">nomination form</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11146">nomination form</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11147">electoral register</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11147">electoral register</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11148">electoral roll</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11148">electoral roll</span></span>

   
## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11149">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11149">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11150">national health service number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11150">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11151">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11151">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11152">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11152">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11153">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11153">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11154">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11154">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11155">3 个或 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11155">either 3 or 10 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11156">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11156">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11157">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11157">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11158">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11158">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11159">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11159">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11160">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11160">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11161">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11161">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11162">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11162">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11163">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11163">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11164">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11164">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11165">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11165">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11166">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11166">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11167">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11167">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11168">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11168">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11169">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11169">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11187">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11187">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11188">NINO 保险号码 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11188">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11189">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家标识号敏感信息类型中。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11189">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11190">它作为独立的敏感信息类型实体提供。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11190">It's available as a stand-alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11192">七个字符或九个字符，用空格或短划线分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11192">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11193">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11194">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11194">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11195">两个字母 (有效 NINOs 仅使用此前缀中的某些字符，此模式对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11195">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11196">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11196">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11197">"A"、B、C 或"D" (类似前缀，后缀中只允许某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11197">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case-sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11198">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11198">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11199">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11199">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11200">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11200">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11201">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11201">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11202">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11202">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11203">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11203">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11204">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11204">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11205">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11205">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11206">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11206">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11207">"A"、"B"、"C"或"D"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11207">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11208">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11208">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11209">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11209">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11210">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11210">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11211">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11211">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11212">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11212">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11213">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11213">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11214">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11214">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11215">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11215">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11237">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11237">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11238">唯一的纳税参考编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11238">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11239">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11239">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11240">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11240">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11241">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11241">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11242">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11242">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11243">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11243">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11244">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11244">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11245">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11245">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11246">不带空格和分隔符的 10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11246">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11247">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11247">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11248">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11248">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11249">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11250">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11250">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11251">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11252">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11252">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11253">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11253">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11254">找到 的  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11254">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11255">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11255">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11256">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11256">Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11257">tax number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11257">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11258">tax file</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11258">tax file</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11259">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11259">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11260">tax identification no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11260">tax identification no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11262">tax no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11262">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11263">tax no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11263">tax no</span></span>

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11274">美国银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11274">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11275">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11275">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11276">6-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11276">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11277">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11277">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11278">6-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11278">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11279">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11280">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11281">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11282">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11282">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11283">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11283">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11284">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11284">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11314">美国驾驶证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11314">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11315">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11315">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11316">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11316">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11317">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11317">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11318">取决于州 -例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11318">depends on the state - for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11319">9 个数字，格式为 ddd ddd ddd 将匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11319">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11320">9 个数字（如 ddddddddd）不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11320">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11321">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11321">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11322">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11322">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11323">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11323">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11324">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11324">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11325">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11325">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11326">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11326">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11327">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11327">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11328">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11328">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11329">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11329">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11330">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11330">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11331">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11331">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11332">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11332">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11430">ITIN 中美国个人纳税 (标识号) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11430">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11431">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11431">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11432">九个数字，以"9"开头，包含"7"或"8"作为第四个数字，可选格式为空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11432">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11433">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11433">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11434">格式化：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11434">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11435">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11435">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11436">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11436">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11437">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11437">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11438">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11438">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11439">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11439">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11440">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11440">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11441">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11441">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11442">unformatted：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11442">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11443">数字"9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11443">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11444">两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11444">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11445">"7"或"8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11445">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11446">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11446">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11447">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11447">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11448">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11448">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11449">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11449">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11450">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11450">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11451">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11451">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11452">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11452">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11453">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11453">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11454">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11454">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11455">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11455">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11456">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11456">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11457">函数Func_formatted_itin或Func_unformatted_itin找到与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11457">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11458">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11458">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11459">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11459">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11460">将</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11460">taxpayer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11461">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11461">tax id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11462">tax identification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11462">tax identification</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11463">itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11463">itin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11464">i.t.i.n.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11464">i.t.i.n.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11465">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11465">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11466">tin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11466">tin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11467">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11467">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11468">tax payer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11468">tax payer</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11469">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11469">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11470">已</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11470">taxid</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11471">individual taxpayer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11471">individual taxpayer</span></span> 


## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11472">SSN (美国社会保险) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11472">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11473">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11473">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11474">九个数字，可能采用格式化或无格式模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11474">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11475">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11475">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11476">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11476">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11477">四个函数以四种不同的模式查找 SSN：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11477">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11478">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11478">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11479">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11480">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11481">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11482">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11482">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11483">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11483">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11484">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11484">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11485">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11485">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11486">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11486">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11487">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11487">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11488">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11488">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11489">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11489">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11490">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11490">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11491">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11491">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11492">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11492">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11493">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11493">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11494">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近范围内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，其置信度较低：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11494">A DLP policy has low confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11495">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11495">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11496">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11496">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11511">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11511">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11512">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11512">passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11513">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11514">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11514">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11515">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11516">九个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11516">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11517">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11518">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11518">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11519">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11520">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息时，具有很高的可信度：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11520">A DLP policy has high confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11521">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11521">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11522">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11522">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11523">找到的 `Keywords_eu_passport_date` 关键字来自</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11523">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_date` is found</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11524">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11524">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11525">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11525">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11526">找到 或 `Keywords_eu_passport_number` `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11526">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_passport_number` or `Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. / U.K. Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_date" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11543">此敏感信息类型仅在：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11543">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11544">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11544">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11545">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11545">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11546">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11546">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11547">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11547">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11548">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11548">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11549">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11549">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11550">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11550">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11551">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11551">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11552">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11552">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11553">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11553">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11554">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11554">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11555">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11555">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11556">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11556">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11557">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11557">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11558">找到来自Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11558">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11569">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11569">data loss prevention policies</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11574">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11574">Format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11576">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11577">八字符字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11577">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11580">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11580">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11583">DLP 策略在 300 个字符的邻近度内检测到这种类型的敏感信息，可信度中等：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11583">A DLP policy has medium confidence that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11584">正则表达式Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International查找与模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11584">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">

          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11586">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11586">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="68ac8-11587">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68ac8-11587">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>
